attributes.action: Stop the Toll increse of 50p in October 2012 & 2014 for the Dartford Crossing Kent & Essex
attributes.additional_details:
LETS STOP THIS NOW PLEASE SIGN & FORWARD THE LINK WE NEED TO GET THIS LOOKED AT BY PARLIAMENT WE NEED 100000 NAMES

Cash charge £2.50 Cars 2 - £3.00 Axle Goods - £6.00 Multi AxleGoods
Dart-Tag charge £1.67 Cars - £2.63 2 Axle Goods - £5.19 Multi Axle Goods

Here is a table of the increase http://twitpic.com/9nxx2s

We will be increasing the crossing charge in two successive steps: first in October 2012 and second at the same time as the introduction of free-flow charging technology at the Crossing, currently scheduled for October 2014.  Charges for cars and 2 axle vehicles will rise by 50p on both instances.  Proportionate increases in the charges for the other classes of vehicles will take place at the same times.
http://www.dft.gov.uk/consultations/dft-2011-08
